statements: REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON FitnessData TO user_role1;
REVOKE SELECT ON FitnessData TO user_role2;
REVOKE DELETE ON FitnessData TO user_role3;
REVOKE SELECT ON FitnessUser FROM user1
REVOKE UPDATE ON FitnessActivity FROM user2
REVOKE DELETE ON FitnessUser FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT, UPDATE ON workout_plan FROM public
REVOKE DELETE ON exercise FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON user_statistics FROM public
REVOKE SELECT ON users FROM public
REVOKE INSERT ON workouts FROM public
REVOKE UPDATE ON exercises FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON users FROM public
REVOKE SELECT, DELETE ON activities FROM public
REVOKE ALL ON workouts FROM public
